title: Nineteen Lincolns
description: portrait of bearded man dressed as President Lincoln; man seated resting hat over PR knee; mole on PR cheek; wincing smile; gold watch chain attached to vest; PL hand resting on PL thigh; blurry trees in background with blue sky seen through branches; framed behind glass in black wood frame; one of a set of 18 photographs to be displayed together
creditline: The Shirley Mahowald and Henry Kinsell Endowment for Art Acquisition
